FragmentShaderCode:
#version 330 core 
out vec4 FragColor;in vec3 TexColor;in vec2 TexCoord;in float TextureNumber;uniform sampler2D[16] Sampler2DArray; void main(){     int TextureNumberInt = int(TextureNumber);    FragColor = vec4(TexColor.r,TexColor.g,TexColor.b,texture(Sampler2DArray[TextureNumberInt],TexCoord).a);}
